tests.name: Uppercase
tests.cmd: disemvowel("A HORRIBLE HATEFUL MESSAGE FROM A TROLL");

tests.name: Description
tests.cmd: disemvowel("This technique, called _disemvowelment_, is often employed to reduce the effectiveness of troll messages in online fora.");
tests.expected: "+h5 +(hnq, (11d _d5m^w1mn+_, 5 f+n mp1yd + rd( +h ff(+^n55 f +r11 m5595 n n1n fr."

tests.name: Non ASCII
tests.cmd: disemvowel("「Disemvowelment」はASCII文字に対してのみ有効です。");
tests.expected: "「D5m^w1mn+」は5(文字に対してのみ有効です。"
